name: Space Roar
description:
After completely screwing your previous job, you have just arrived at hangar X AE A with the aim of upgrading your ship and thus continue to improve your space smuggler services. These are difficult times, but with better technology and your mastery of the ship, you will once again be the best smuggler in space.

You need a gamepad to play (Xbox 360 gamepad is okay)

  • Move with left joystick
  • Turbo with RT 
  • Look/Direction with right joystick
  • Accept (A)
  • Cancel (B)
  • Inventory (X)
  • Look Quest while doing quest (Y)

A game made by

Alex Espada - Programmer

Oriol Comas - Programmer

Tiktok: @spaceroar
